dkeep.logic

Class DrunkenGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Entity
      • dkeep.logic.Guard
        • dkeep.logic.DrunkenGuard

  • public class DrunkenGuard
extends Guard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrunkenGuard(Position pos, char rep)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getMove()
      Returns the current movement of this guard, according to its asleep and reverse state.
      void move()
      According to the current direction of the guard's movement, updates its index on the movement array.
      void setAsleep()
      Reverses its current state.
      void setRepresentation()
      Changes the current representation of this guard, symbolizing its state (awake or asleep).
      boolean status()
      Returns the current asleep status of this guard.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrunkenGuard

        public DrunkenGuard(Position pos,
                    char rep)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        pos - the coordinates of this drunken guard on the dungeon map
        rep - the representation of this drunken guard on a char based map

    • Method Detail

      • setAsleep

        public void setAsleep()
        Reverses its current state. If it's asleep, it wakes up, and vice-versa.

      • move

        public void move()
        According to the current direction of the guard's movement, updates its index on the movement array. If it's asleep, it doesn't move.
        Specified by:
        move in class Guard

      • setRepresentation

        public void setRepresentation()
        Changes the current representation of this guard, symbolizing its state (awake or asleep).

      • getMove

        public char getMove()
        Returns the current movement of this guard, according to its asleep and reverse state. If its asleep, then it returns an invalid movement. Else, similar to the suspicious guard, checks the direction of the movement and acts accordingly.
        Specified by:
        getMove in class Guard

      • status

        public boolean status()
        Returns the current asleep status of this guard.
        Overrides:
        status in class Guard
        Returns:
        the current status of the guard
